title: Sketchbook Folio, "Group of Figures, Study the Donation, after Giulio Romano", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left corner: 39; at upper right: Giulio Romano Roma. On verso: fondi azzuri/ comparto d'oro/ fine (?) delle candigliere/ Sibille e Profeti; Bramante Lodi
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three kneeling women, one holding child. One woman's face seen in profile, and one woman seen from behind.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Group of Figures, Study the Donation, after Giulio Romano", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and light and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3508.
